GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.17.3
GSD.description:
net: openvswitch: fix leak of nested actions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 53bce9d19b0a9d245b25cd050b81652ed974a509, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 34ae932a40369be6bd6ea97d66b6686361b4370d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: openvswitch: fix leak of nested actions
